mapper.sql: id, first_name AS firstName, last_name AS lastName, nationality, survey_time_start AS surveyTimeStart, survey_time_end AS surveyTimeEnd, email, tel, survey_port AS surveyPort, surveyor_profile AS surveyorProfile, company_id AS companyId, portrait_url AS portraitUrl, create_date AS createDate, create_by AS createBy, update_date AS updateDate, update_by AS updateBy, del_flag AS delFlag
